channel.title: CVE Feed for SoftEther VPN -- SoftEther VPN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SoftEther VPN -- SoftEther VPN

item.title: CVE-2023-32275|2024-08-02T15:10:24.240Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the CtEnumCa() functionality of SoftEther VPN 4.41-9782-beta and 5.01.9674. Specially crafted network packets can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can send packets to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22308|2024-08-02T10:07:06.157Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: An integer underflow vulnerability exists in the vpnserver OvsProcessData functionality of SoftEther VPN 5.01.9674 and 5.02. A specially crafted network packet can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-27395|2024-08-02T12:09:43.368Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the vpnserver WpcParsePacket() functionality of SoftEther VPN 4.41-9782-beta, 5.01.9674 and 5.02. A specially crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can perform a man-in-the-middle attack to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-27516|2024-08-02T12:16:36.884Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the CiRpcAccepted() functionality of SoftEther VPN 4.41-9782-beta and 5.01.9674. A specially crafted network packet can lead to unauthorized access. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-25774|2024-08-02T11:32:12.619Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the vpnserver ConnectionAccept() functionality of SoftEther VPN 5.02. A set of specially crafted network connections can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send a sequence of malicious packets to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23581|2024-08-02T10:35:33.372Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the vpnserver EnSafeHttpHeaderValueStr functionality of SoftEther VPN 5.01.9674 and 5.02. A specially crafted network packet can lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-32634|2024-08-02T15:25:35.753Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the CiRpcServerThread() functionality of SoftEther VPN 5.01.9674 and 4.41-9782-beta. An attacker can perform a local man-in-the-middle attack to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-31192|2024-08-02T14:45:26.048Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the ClientConnect() functionality of SoftEther VPN 5.01.9674. A specially crafted network packet can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can perform a man-in-the-middle attack to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22325|2024-08-02T10:07:06.113Z -- softether%20vpn -- softether%20vpn
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the DCRegister DDNS_RPC_MAX_RECV_SIZE functionality of SoftEther VPN 4.41-9782-beta, 5.01.9674 and 5.02. A specially crafted network packet can lead to denial of service. An attacker can perform a man-in-the-middle attack to trigger this vulnerability.
